item.title: Anthropic’s Claude chatbot can now make and edit your Canva designs
item.description: Canva users can now create, edit, and manage their designs by describing their requirements to Anthropic’s Claude AI. The connection is the latest of several integrations that allow Claude users to ac

item.title: What Makes a Car Lovable? It's Not the Tech, It's the Cup Holders
item.description: Frustration with the size, location, and design of cup holders in new cars is on the rise—and it holds enormous influence on whether we buy a ride or not.

item.title: What Makes a Car Lovable? It's Not the Tech, It's the Cup Holders
item.description: Frustration with the size, location, and design of cup holders in new cars is on the rise—and it holds enormous influence on whether we buy a ride or not.
